      Game Information ..:      

  Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance marks the re-launch of the Mortal Kombat series with a 
  lethal dose of unparalleled brutality, supernatural mystique and a reinvented fighting 
  system that will redefine the fighting game genre. This next-generation take on the multi-
  million unit selling franchise features progressive physical damage that allows players to 
  view the inevitable demise of their opponents while utilizing three unique fighting styles 
  for each warrior, creating nearly unlimited fighting possibilities.
